A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This new version of the 'Star Wars' saga is absolute garbage. The story continues to take a backseat to push identity politics\, which is why the plot\, characters\, & story are all over the place in trying to format this messaging. The story & continuity makes no sense. The characters are awful. The writing is incredibly lazy. The only redeeming quality of this film is the visual effects. The story & plot is crap. I could have written a better and more deserving story\, of this beloved franchise\, in a few hours than the load of tripe this film took months to deliver.
